info.title: CCBC Admin API
info.description: CCBC Admin API - Comprehensive backend for CCBC Platform with Joomla integration

schema.title: Response Get Admins Api V1 Admins  Get

get.description: Get admins formatted for DataTable with permissions

put.description: Update admin permissions for multiple modules

get.description: Get current admin's permissions for all modules

post.description: Initialize attendance permissions for all existing admins (requires manage permission)

schema.title: Response Get Posts Api V1 Posts  Get

get.description: Get Joomla articles from the Joomla database

schema.title: Response Get Events Api V1 Events  Get

post.description: Check in attendance using QR code data

get.description: Get attendance records with optional filters

schema.title: Response Get Attendance Records Api V1 Attendance  Get

post.description: Create a new attendance record manually

get.description: Get attendance records for DataTable with pagination, search, and sorting
Get list of available banks for tithe receipts
Get list of available transaction types for tithe receipts

post.description: Create a new tithe receipt submission

get.description: Get list of tithe receipts (admin only)

schema.title: Response Get Tithe Receipts Api V1 Tithe Receipts  Get

post.description: Upload payment receipt file for a tithe receipt

get.description: Get a specific tithe receipt by ID (admin only)

patch.description: Update the status of a tithe receipt (admin only)

get.description: Download the uploaded receipt file (admin only)
